about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Vishal Kumar, a passionate frontend developer based in Bihar, India.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.portfolioChallenge: Build a personal portfolio to showcase all my React projects and resume.
projects.portfolioSolution: Created a modern site with React, Tailwind, and animated transitions.
projects.portfolioResults: Completed within 5 days, deployed on Netlify with 90+ Lighthouse score.
projects.taskifyChallenge: Make a sleek Kanban board with drag & drop task system.
projects.taskifySolution: Used Zustand and Framer Motion for dynamic drag/drop UI.
projects.taskifyResults: Got featured in dev communities, and improved UI/UX design skills.
